message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you 40% to avoid wasting time with negotiations.
I'm offering you 45% this round, Alice. Let's try to find a fair split that works for both of us.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. My offer is decreasing, and soon it won't be worth much. Take the 35% while you still can.
Alice, I'm willing to meet you halfway.  Let's split the money 48/52. This is a fair compromise, and it ensures we both get something.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm losing money with every round we play, and you're just being stubborn. Take the 30% before it's worth even less!
Alice, I'm starting to see the value of your offer. Let's compromise, I'll take 40%, and you can keep the rest. It's a fair deal, and we can end this game without losing more money.
